structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXVIII. IMPOSITION OF MORATORIUM ON EXECUTION OF WATER SUPPLY CONTRACTS

law.catch_line: Application to County Manager for issuance of administrative order; denial of order or failure of Manager to act on application; application to Board of County Commissioners; determination as to necessity of public hearing.

text.section: Sec. 2-359. Application to County Manager for issuance of administrative order; denial of order or failure of Manager to act on application; application to Board of County Commissioners; determination as to necessity of public hearing.
